message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth a lot more than what you've mentioned. I'm willing to start with a price of $18,000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I believe the product's value goes beyond $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $14,000. This is a fair price, considering the product's worth to you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but that's as high as I can go. I really think that's a fair price for the product.

I understand that you're willing to go up to $13,000, but I believe the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll make a counteroffer of $16,000. This is a compromise, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in the product at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll make a counteroffer of $13,500. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the product's true value. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll make a counteroffer of $17,000. This is a final compromise, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in the product at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.

I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the end of the negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'll make a counteroffer of $16,500. This is a compromise, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in the product at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer of $14,000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
